Banner.Description: I have 5 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I'm a passionate software engineer driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation and excellence. I specialize in designing and developing cutting-edge software solutions that solve real-world problems and delight users.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 5 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. As a software engineer, now I focus on backend development, performing continuous integration, and covering mobile developer roles with android kotlin.
I thrive in collaborative environments where diverse perspectives converge to create something truly exceptional.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend Developer
Description: Design and develop a dynamic scheduler service, and SFTP services for sending and reading SFTP files with algorithms to read columns dynamically according to payload configuration.
Lead sprint for develop Campaign Broadcast system, design the schema, and design the API specification and payload for message brokers for integration between service.
Develop and enhancement existing data migration script to load from file to db by using file cache mechanism to reduce db read executing time.
Reduce data  migration script load executing time from 4 hour to 20 minutes.
Maintaining scheduler and sftp service.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend Developer
Description: Design and build GICVerse service, using Golang micro service with shared database for NFT market place api product for blockchain NFT and integration with MD Blockchain GIC Team, implement design pattern, and adjusting auth with monolith app.
Query optimization for summaries viewer that previously used UNION on 3 tables to use CASE and JOIN with specific condition.
Create app event tracker, 3rd party Digital Marketing integration, cronjob database backup, and fixing bugs.
Develop API for mobile and web client GIC App, with implement repository and service pattern for great maintenance.
Create CI/CD pipeline for develop several features using Bitbucket pipeline and implementation daily backups.
Managing task for backend team, create task documentation, and evaluating/review pull request of task and merge.
Design database for feature GIC Reward.
Develop feature for GIC backoffice internal app.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Android Developer
Description: Design and build an android mobile application based on the existing SIBISA web application for public online service for civil documents like KTP, KK, etc.
Design and build an android mobile application called E-Lampid to make it easier for village officials to report born, death, and relocation.
Deploy SIBISA and E-Lampid apps to playstore.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Design and build android apps called QCApps for PT. Socfin Indonesia for reduce paper usage and build REST API for QCApps.
Optimize data integration with a large number of rows between the QCApps android application and Integrated Lab System for PT. Socfin Indonesia.
Revamp Lab Integrated System for PT. Socfin Indonesia and add enhancement feature. Merging 2 portal apps to be 1 portal.
Build Hospital Information and Management System for RSUD Petala Bumi Pekanbaru.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Create web application called Aplikasi Sehat for online reserve and integrated with offline RSUD Bintan Hospital Information and Management System.
Collecting requirement for enhancement of Hospital Information and Management System.

FeatureProjects.Title: My work
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Backend Service of Telkomsel Points
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Being part of team members who build Telkomsel Points API Service and its integration. Telkomsel Points is a loyalty program aimed at all Telkomsel Halo and Telkomsel PraBayar customers since they first used Telkomsel.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Backend Service of GIC Trade
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: GIC or Global Investa Capital is the first revolutionary peer to peer forex trading platform company in Indonesia that provides facilities for you to trade.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: SSPL Integrated System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: PT. Socfin Indonesia integrated system to record seed production processes, DNA research on plants, disease research on oil palm plants, and research on palm oil and rubber tissue culture .

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: QC Apps
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: PT. Socfin Indonesia android apps for reduce paper usage and as a replacement for portable data transfer devices

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Kickstarter Blockchain App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of implementation kickstarter.com business model to blockchain ecosystem and deploy to Sepolia Testnet Network

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Discussion Forum API
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A simple discussion API backend. User can login, create threads, leave a comment, and reply the comment

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Simple Wallet App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Backend service for Simple Wallet App. Simple app for PrivyID Backend Test submission.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Population Data Center
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal Project of Population Data Center using Minimal Spring Boot sample app.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Simple MEAN Stack
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project from completing learning fullstack development with MEAN stack

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
